title: Bella
description: Living by my father’s rules has never been easy. Who does he think he is anyway? Jase Steel has broken every rule he tries to make me live by.The Four Ds:N̶o̶ ̶D̶a̶t̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶ (Thanks to Carly and Momma Joe, that was nixed at sixteen.)N̶o̶ ̶D̶r̶i̶n̶k̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶ (Shots of Jack at prom.) N̶o̶ ̶D̶r̶u̶g̶s̶ ̶ (College frat party and a bear-shaped bong named Smokey.)The last one though, that last D, ruined my virgin skin, my relationship with my father, and changed my whole life.N̶o̶ ̶D̶e̶c̶o̶r̶a̶t̶i̶n̶g̶I should have listened to him … but I didn’t.Tag — I’m it.
author: M.J. Fields
